name: Housing Services
description: Swords to Plowshares is a veteran-focused Coordinated Entry Access Point for adult (aged 18 years and older) without minor children who are experiencing homelessness or are at risk of homelessness. Services available include: - Problem Solving support - Housing assessments - Housing search case management - Referral to community services, including mental health assessments and substance abuse counseling - Assistance with benefits like Medi-Cal and SSDI How to Apply: - Call (415) 727-VETS (8387)
fullDescription: Swords to Plowshares is a veteran-focused Coordinated Entry Access Point for adult (aged 18 years and older) without minor children who are experiencing homelessness or are at risk of homelessness. Services available include: - Problem Solving support - Housing assessments - Housing search case management - Referral to community services, including mental health assessments and substance abuse counseling - Assistance with benefits like Medi-Cal and SSDI How to Apply: - Call (415) 727-VETS (8387)
whatTheyOffer: Swords to Plowshares is a veteran-focused Coordinated Entry Access Point for adult (aged 18 years and older) without minor children who are experiencing homelessness or are at risk of homelessness. Services available include: - Problem Solving support - Housing assessments - Housing search case management - Referral to community services, including mental health assessments and substance abuse counseling - Assistance with benefits like Medi-Cal and SSDI How to Apply: - Call (415) 727-VETS (8387)
requirements: Must be a veteran and have a DD214, Social Security card & valid state ID. Case manager can help clients order DD214 and California IDs.
keywords: i am an adult over 27 years old without children.
i am over 24 years old without children.
i am experiencing homelessness (on the street, couchsurfing, or other) and i need long-term housing assistance.
